name: Fritz d'Orey
introduction: Frdrico Jos Carlos Themudo "Fritz" d'Orey (born 25 March 1938 in So Paulo, State of So Paulo, Southeast Region, Brazil  died 31 August 2020 in Cascais, Lisbon, Portugal) was a racing driver who drove in Formula One in 1959. He entered six races, appearing and qualifying for three, but failed to score any points.
